name: Russian SUV 4x4 Offroad Rally - Try UAZ SUV
name_original: Russian SUV 4x4 Offroad Rally - Try UAZ SUV
description:
Become a professional Russian SUV driver in offroad rally!
Drive UAZ 4x4 to complete tasks and explore offroad terrains with mud. Test your driving skills with all 9 different UAZ models - from old school to offroad monsters! UAZ 4x4 is the best SUV ever! Get ready for offroad missions: drive a Russian truck and do offroad tasks.

Features of Russian SUV 4x4 Offroad Rally:

- 9 different UAZ models
- Freeride and Career
- UAZ upgrades
- Easy UAZ driving controls
- Difficult missions
- Powerful Russian truck 4x4
- Offroad UAZ driving
- 3D graphics

Take part in UAZ offroad rally!
Feel like an offroad SUV driver with our driving game! Drive truck from one rally location to another. Complete driving orders. Do it in time, Russian SUV UAZ is very fast. Try the power of a big truck with offroad UAZ driving. Be fast, rally is hard. Use a navigation map to find the route. Find new offroad ways to drive your Russian truck in the UAZ rally.

Fight with offroad terrain!
Test the power of Russian rally truck. Deep into the offroad UAZ driving. Do you like offroad SUV? So, it is time to try our Russian SUV 4x4 Offroad Rally. Drive UAZ 4x4 to feel the power of truck. Try driving without roads. A great rally for professionals!

Enjoy the atmosphere of Russian offroad.
If you aren't rally driver, you can drive a truck in the UAZ 4x4 Offroad Rally. Try the driving across offroad terrain and enjoy the offroad atmosphere. Drive Russian UAZ fast, don't lose the control of your truck during the rally.

Get ready for offroad missions.
Drive UAZ 4x4 to complete tasks and explore offroad terrains with hills and mud. Test your offroad skills with the truck driving. UAZ 4x4 is the best UAZ ever! Drive a truck and do offroad tasks.

Forget about comfortable SUV driving!
Drive as a professional rally driver with our game, forget about comfortable SUV driving. Jump to the cabin of truck, be in time and don't underestimate 4x4 truck. Drive it and complete all orders in the UAZ 4x4 driving.

It is a great driving game! Learn how to drive truck and be accurate. Today is the best day to drive a truck in our UAZ rally. Try our Russian SUV 4x4 Offroad Rally, drive UAZ 4x4 with us and face adventures!
